definition: commerce/merchant/dealer/to consult/2nd note in pentatonic scale/quotient (as in 智商[zhi4 shang1], intelligence quotient)
affair/business/matter/to be engaged in/to attend to/by all means
ministry/department/section/part/division/troops/board/classifier for works of literature, films, machines etc

sentences.english: U. S. Secretary of Commerce Gary Locke with Mr. Hong.
sentences.chinese: 康律师和美国商务部长骆家辉先生。

sentences.english: CBRC shall, on the same day as issuing the approval certificate, submit to the Ministry of Commerce the approval certificate stub.
sentences.chinese: 银监会在代发当日将批准证书存根送商务部。

sentences.english: The power to interpret the present Supplementary Provisions shall remain with the Ministry of Construction and the Ministry of Commerce.
sentences.chinese: 本补充规定由建设部和商务部按照各自职责负责解释。

sentences.english: The stoves will arrive in Xining on Tuesday, the ministry said.
sentences.chinese: 商务部发言人称，取暖炉预计将于周二当天运抵西宁。

sentences.english: Article 21: The establishment of a branch by a company with an investment nature shall be submitted to the Ministry of Commerce for examination and approval.
sentences.chinese: 第二十一条投资性公司设立分支机构应报商务部审批。

sentences.english: Wang, at the Commerce Ministry, said that demand from abroad remained strong.
sentences.chinese: 商务部的王超表示外国需求依然强劲。

sentences.english: Mr Obama nominated Gary Locke as commerce secretary.
sentences.chinese: 奥巴马提名骆家辉为商务部长。

sentences.english: That’s a lot what I've been doing as Commerce Secretary.
sentences.chinese: 这也是我作为商务部长一直以来的主要工作。

sentences.english: To undertake other assignments designated by the regional government and state commerce bureau.
sentences.chinese: 承担自治区人民政府和国家商务部交办的其他事项。

sentences.english: Doc" Comfort will probably refer you to a specialist, such as an orthopedist or a neurologist."
sentences.chinese: “商务部”安慰你大概是指专科如骨科或头痛。

sentences.english: I am glad that Secretary Locke is there with you to represent the United States.
sentences.chinese: 我很高兴商务部长骆家辉先生与你一同在场代表美国。

sentences.english: The MOFCOM shall make a rapid examination and make a final award.
sentences.chinese: 商务部应当迅速进行审查并作出终裁决定。

sentences.english: Liu said the ministry's antitrust office hasn't been staffed yet.
sentences.chinese: 刘程表示，商务部的反垄断部门尚未组建。

sentences.english: Chen Rongkai, a spokesman for China's Commerce Ministry, denied it has imposed such a ban.
sentences.chinese: 中国商务部发言人陈荣凯否认中国实施了这项禁令。

sentences.english: Be transferred from the Ministry of Commerce Ambassador demoted?
sentences.chinese: 调离商务部驻华大使算是降职？

sentences.english: At present, the Coca-Cola already expressed that will report to the department of commercial affairs .
sentences.chinese: 目前，可口可乐已经表示将向商务部申报。
